TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit BindingMemberInfo extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: 包含信息，使 可以将数据绑定解析为某对象的属性或对象列表中当前对象的属性。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo>返回的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingMemberInfo%2A>属性的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>类。
<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo>根据字符串传递给创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。
## Examples 下面的代码示例输出<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A>为每个控件在窗体上。
[!code-cpp[Classic BindingMemberInfo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingMemberInfo Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingMemberInfo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingMemberInfo Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingMemberInfo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingMemberInfo Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public BindingMemberInfo (string dataMember);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string dataMember) cil managed
Public Sub New (dataMember As String)
public: BindingMemberInfo(System::String ^ dataMember);
new System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo : string -> System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo

Docs.param: 解析为某对象的属性或对象列表中当前对象的属性的导航路径。
Docs.summary: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo>调用时自动创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.%23ctor%2A>与控件属性名称、 数据源和导航路径的构造函数。 `dataMember`参数包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A>字符串。

MemberSignature.Value: public string BindingField { get; }
.property instance string BindingField
Public ReadOnly Property BindingField As String
public: property System::String ^ BindingField { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.BindingField : string

Docs.summary: 获取数据绑定对象的属性名。
Docs.value: 数据绑定对象的属性名。 这可以是一个空字符串 ("")。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A>是返回的导航路径中找到的最后一项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A>属性。 例如，如果一个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>将创建一个具有`dataMember`参数的"Customers.custToOrders.OrderDate"<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A>将返回"OrderDate"。
## Examples 下面的代码示例获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo>每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>窗体和打印<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A>，并<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A>属性值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo>。
[!code-cpp[Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string BindingMember { get; }
.property instance string BindingMember
Public ReadOnly Property BindingMember As String
public: property System::String ^ BindingMember { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.BindingMember : string

Docs.summary: 获取用于指定数据绑定对象的属性名的信息。
Docs.value: 解析为最终数据绑定对象的属性名的空字符串 ("")、单个属性名或句点分隔的属性名层次结构。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo>调用时自动创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.%23ctor%2A>与控件属性名称、 数据源和导航路径的构造函数。 `dataMember`参数包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A>字符串。
<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A>是句点分隔的组合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A>值。 例如，当一个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>通过创建`dataMember`参数的"Customers.custToOrders.OrderDate"<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A>将返回"Customers.custToOrders.OrderDate"。
## Examples 下面的代码示例获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo>对象的每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>窗体和打印<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A>，并<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A>属性值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo>。
[!code-cpp[Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string BindingPath { get; }
.property instance string BindingPath
Public ReadOnly Property BindingPath As String
public: property System::String ^ BindingPath { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.BindingPath : string

Docs.summary: 获取数据绑定对象的属性名之前的属性名或句点分隔的属性名层次结构。
Docs.value: 数据绑定对象属性名之前的属性名或句点分隔的属性名层次结构。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A>就是的句点分隔的组合的属性名称的作用之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A>中返回的导航路径<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A>属性。 例如，当一个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>将创建一个具有`dataMember`参数"Customers.custToOrders.OrderDate"<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A>将返回"Customers.custToOrders"。
## Examples 下面的代码示例获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo>每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>窗体和打印<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingField%2A>，并<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A>属性值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo>。
[!code-cpp[Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingMemberInfo.BindingPath Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
